about_me.des: I am a graduate student, and interested in machine learning and big data.

projects.CRF-Spark: A Spark-based implementation of Conditional Random Fields (CRFs) for segmenting/labeling sequential data.

career.Future_des: I'll graduate at Apr. 2017, and start my first job as an advertising engineer at Tencent.
career.Master_des: At September 2014, I started my graduate studies at PAML Lab of Shanghai Jiao Tong University.
career.Bachelor_des: At July 2014,I graduated from Zhejiang University.
